titlestmt.titleproper: Office of Corporate and Foundation Relations RecordsUA199

publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-11-01 10:15:43 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: Office of Corporate and Foundation Relations Records

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into two series: Corporate prospect files and Foundation prospect files.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Corporate and Foundation Relations (CFR) team at Tufts University is the starting point for organizations wishing to develop unique and profitable partnerships with a world-class teaching and research institution.
CFR is part of University Advancement.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records are closed for 75 years from the date of creation.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records demonstrate the relationship between CFR and various corporate and foundation funding sources for the promotion of grants and activities at Tufts University. Some records contain legacy correspondence that pre-dates the existence of the Office of CFR. Materials include correspondence, memos, clippings, company and foundation reports, grant reports, and financial information. The bulk of the records date from the 1980s and 1990s.
